items.sentence: I\'m not sure that that\'s what Tom really wanted to say.
It made Tom\'s head hurt to think about all those things.
I don\'t think I have the energy to walk to school today.
When I was 18, I decided to take a year off from college.
Tom started working as a carpenter about three years ago.
Tom went to the drugstore to buy medicine for his mother.
I want a nice backyard where I can have barbecue parties.
Do you know Tom well enough to ask him to lend you money?
Do you know whether or not Tom likes cream in his coffee?
Tom and Mary aren\'t likely to ever see each other again.
